info.name: the sad fate of sharpness in CG
info.description:
on still image you can reach the maximum screen sharpness.
But if you want to allow free trans, rot, scal, persp, then antialiasing limit you to half resol.

Left: exact match. Mid: 1/2 pix offset.  Right: offs= fract(t)
